data.text: The COVID-19 pandemic impact was clearly visible in our October traffic figures. In October, we carried 100,800 passengers, which is 92.0% less than in the corresponding period of 2019. Cargo demand was still strong. Read more: https://t.co/wWdAXgfzFK https://t.co/V25eHfSeKN

data.text: Our pilots are now using mobile EFB for their flights instead of PC devices fixed on the aircraft. The new EFB system runs on iPads, travels with the pilot and connects him/her to a variety of tools, such as flight planning, charts, manuals, and reporting, regardless of location. https://t.co/MhsS43R1k6

data.text: Finnair Group Interim Report 1 January – 30 September 2020: Heavy COVID-19 impact continued. Earnings per share were -0.15 euros (0.08). Revenue decreased by 88.7% to 97.4 million euros (865.4). https://t.co/zHIzTwM3SV

urls.title: Feedback and compensation
urls.description: We are currently experiencing backlog in our customer service. We are sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! We appreciate your feedback and are here to assist you with your claims and other concerns. Your feedback is valuable to us in developing our services further. For more general topics, please check our frequently asked questions, or get assistance from our chat service at any

data.text: @ShazeTelly Hi! I am sorry to hear this. I would like to ask if you have created a claim on our website? https://t.co/euSwhx7KJA. -Sara

urls.title: Palautteet ja korvaukset
urls.description: Meillä on tällä hetkellä ruuhkaa. Pahoittelemme pitkää vastausaikaa. Keskimääräinen käsittelyaikamme on neljä viikkoa. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi. Otamme mielellämme vastaan palautetta ja autamme sinua korvaushakemuksissa ja muissa ongelmatilanteissa. Palautteesi on meille arvokasta ja se auttaa meitä palvelumme kehittämisessä. Yleisemmissä aiheissa pyydämme tutustumaan usein kysyttyihin kysymyksiimme tai kysymään apua chat-palvelumme

data.text: @aemiettinen Hei Asko! Pahoitteluni ikävästä palvelukokemuksesta. Jos haluat antaa palautetta, voit tehdä sen osoitteessa https://t.co/BUCdFllQp3. Voin myös välittää palautteen puolestasi asiakaspalauteosastollemme, jos ilmoitat yksityisviestinä varaustunnuksesi ja sähköpostiosoitteesi. -Sara
RT @thedesignair: The Flygge Series: A taste of Finnair, in your own home https://t.co/CuQbFIdpaS

data.text: “The risk of a passenger contracting COVID-19 while onboard appears very low. With only 44 identified potential cases of flight-related transmission among 1.2 billion travelers, that’s one case for every 27 million travelers." https://t.co/WmytILeeKu @IATA
@pressfivefor Hi! The flights are on Wednesdays and Fridays, starting from November 7. -Petra
@SarbjeetBassan Hi! I'm sorry to hear about the long waiting time. Could you please DM us your booking reference and contact details so we can have a look. -Petra
@CamronV0ice Hi! Could you please send your booking details to us by DM so we can check. //Jukka-Pekka
@nikize0 Hi! I have forwarded your feedback forward regarding Manage booking. I'll check your DM next. /Minna
@Melanie09132738 Hi. Our direct flights to and from New York City has been canceled until March 2021. //Mari
@the_malice_free Hi. At the moment the first scheduled flight to Delhi is on March 28, 2021. //Mari

@ArveSystad Hi, if one or several flights has been canceled by Finnair, then it's not possible to cancel the booking online. Kindly send us a DM with your booking and contact details so that we can help you with this. //Mari

We are sorry that our customer service is congested at the moment. Do you have a question regarding a cancelled flight? We are cancelling the flights in phases starting from Nov and we’ll inform you personally if your flight has been affected. Read more: https://t.co/dxT82iConx https://t.co/92OGSFU9Kc
@benparslew Hi! I'm very sorry to hear about the long waiting time. Could you DM us your booking reference, so we can check if we could find any payment info from Opodo. -Petra
@Harry_YY_UK Hi! I'm sorry to hear about the flight cancellation. Could you DM us your booking ref. and flight details, so we can help you with the refund. -Petra
@nikize0 Hi! I'm sorry to hear about the flight cancellation. If you'd like us to check your booking and see if there are any alternative flights, please DM us your booking ref. and flight info
RT @kiviselg_sander: @Finnair took delivery of this beautiful A350-900 OH-LWA 5 years ago. What a beauty she is! Now Finnair operates 16 of…
RT @AlexInAir: A truly memorable A350 delivery flight from Toulouse to Helsinki. A great team, beautiful cabin & the start of a new chapter…
Exactly five years ago, we had the delivery of the first member of our Airbus A350 family. Since then, the family has grown to 16 members! ✈️ #FinnairA350 #feelfinnair https://t.co/nQd4jrbUCJ

Nĭ hăo Nanjing! Our service between Nanjing and Helsinki continues: As of  23rd of October (subject to government approval), we fly once a week from Helsinki to Nanjing and back. The flights will continue until 21st of March, 2021. https://t.co/mTBbpi1qoh
In September, Finnair carried 115,500 passengers, which is 91.0% less than in the corresponding period of 2019 and 40.1% less than in August 2020. https://t.co/PLoJUATHEB
RT @paivyttallqvist: Five years ago today we got our first #FinnairA350 home from Toulouse. After that, we saw growth, recruitments and new…
@Sofia42847516 Hi Sophie, I'm sorry to hear that your flight got cancelled. Please send your booking reference, email address and phone number via DM that we can take a look at your booking. //Roosa
@ranjuinthesky Hi, unfortunately flights to/from Haneda are cancelled until 2021.//Roosa
